summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements (REQ-5, REQ-6, REQ-7). The backend/main.mo file contains updateTaskStatus, completeTask, and getClientTasks functions with proper status masking, financial calculations using the specified hourly rates (Junior: 35k, Senior: 55k, Expert: 75k), and TaskClientView type excluding internalData. Frontend integration is present with corresponding hooks and UI components. The migration.mo file properly handles data structure updates for jamEfektif and levelPartner fields.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data structure migration from old schema to new schema with jamEfektif and levelPartner fields
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states 'Non-goals: ... Adding database persistence beyond in-memory state'. The migration module suggests a persistence/upgrade mechanism not requested in the requirements.
